statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ServerName , AA.Description FROM dbo.TServer AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ServerName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TServer AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TServer ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ServerName, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ServerName#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TServer SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName= #UpdatedByName#
, ServerName = #ServerName# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
